development.title: Development
development.blurb: Built by me using React and Next.js

featuredProjects.title: Featured Projects.
featuredProjects.blurb: The following is a selection of work ranging from year-long initiatives, to short intensive sprints. It's varied from product design, to design systems, to brand design. The thing it has in common is it's all work that I'm proud to have been a part of.

gemini.project: Bringing AI into the heart of Google Chrome on Desktop

gm3.project: Designing a modern, colorful refresh to Chrome on Desktop, a 1B+ user product

designSystem.project: Establishing a Design System for Chrome that drives cohesion

resultsAboutYou.project: Empowering users to take control and remove their personal information on Search

audible.project: Developing a bold, yet viable product vision that differentiates Audible amongst competitors

ikea.project: A data beacon project for IKEA to help explore the possibilities of open data

leafly.project: Designing the digital experience around the launch of Leafly's new strain system

shaw.project: Co-leading design of a digital ecosystem for one of Canadas largest telcos, Shaw
